A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite exceptional cinematography and actor performance\, the incompetently-written story and abysmal character development earn \"The Last Jedi\" the prize of being the worst Star Wars film to date.  With 2/3 of this trilogy under the bridge\, does it have any identity other than fanservice?  Unfortunately\, the answer is no.  At this point\, it's rather doubtful that J. J. Abrams can salvage the trilogy with Episode IX.
